Mobster wobbled some, but that was the extent of it. He turned around.

Mob=
ster (Grenade voice): Are you trying to knock me over, little man?

Mobster=
 fires at Razorclaw once...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWO=
LF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 7:54 PM
  =
Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


  A sudden shadow covered Razor Claw as Mobs=
ters foot raised above him. "Oh Pit" he yelled as he turned to run. His ene=
rgy was low so he didn't want to risk his shield not holding. He ran toward=
 Mobster. Mobsters foot struck the ground behind Razor Claw, the impact sho=
ok the ground sending Razor claw rolling past the giant gestalt. He rolled =
to his feat and turned again ready for battle. He dove forward at Mobsters =
rear end hoping the giant would still be off balance enough to knock over.
=
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: SOULSTICE 
    To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
    Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 10:46 AM
    Subject: Re: Sorry=
 soulstice


    (I normally am against stomping, but...)
     
    Mobster=
 raised his foot.

    Mobster (Kracken voice): Over!

    Mobster brung hi=
s foot down towards Razorclaw...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, Decembe=
r 24, 2000 12:11 PM
      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


      Razor Claw r=
emained still as a statue, watching the battle rage around him. He opened a=
 comm to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any available maximal, I'm pinned=
 down and need some coverfire."
        ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
   From: SOULSTICE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday,=
 December 23, 2000 1:16 PM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        M=
obster stood still. The raptor would have to move sometime.

        Mobste=
r (Horn Drill voice): He'll have to move sometime. Who helped to build this=
 house?

        Mobster kept his cannon aimed at Razorclaw, waiting and wa=
tching...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: CYBERWOLF=
4 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, December 23,=
 2000 12:48 PM
          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


          Razor Cla=
w knew that there was only one way to survive a blast from a weapon of that=
 size. he transformed to Raptor mode and used full strength on his shield. =
The ground around him incinerated on contact. He survived but it was sappin=
g to much of his strength. The raptor couldn't move without deactivating hi=
s shield.
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: SOULS=
TICE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Friday, Decembe=
r 22, 2000 10:04 AM
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


            =
Mobster took a scratch of damage, still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster =
aimed his giant cannon at Razorclaw and fired...
              ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
              From: CYBERWOLF4 
              To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
              Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
        =
      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


              Razor Claw stood confuse=
d for the moment, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped forward and hurl=
ed his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impress me?" he asked looking=
 up at the bot he challenged. 
                ----- Original Message -----=
 
                From: SOULSTICE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
                =
Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                Gigas didn't move an inch, s=
eeing as how Mobster was in his place now.

                Gigas: How abou=
t this, I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.
=

                Mobster switches voices.

                Kracken: But rig=
ht now, we're Mobster...
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
                From: CYBERWOLF4 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                  Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
             =
     Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                  Razor Claw looked up =
at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a challenge, Let's=
 make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your alliance, I knock yo=
u down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled hi=
s left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first."
=
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From:=
 SOULSTICE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                   =
 Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
                    Subject: R=
e: Sorry soulstice


                    Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an u=
nfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, but I didn't want to waste anything =
on you. In other words, I am not intimidated. I have seen battles come and =
go, me taking the brunt of the attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I s=
till fight. You know, you should join the Alliance, it would do you a world=
 of good.

                    Gigas stayed planted to his spot, not moving=
 an inch...
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
           =
           From: CYBERWOLF4 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                      Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
         =
             Subject: Sorry soulstice


                      Sorry, it mus=
t've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

                      claw =
struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled o=
ver by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy th=
at he again came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw.=
 (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a =
large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Raz=
orclaw

                      Razor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' pun=
ch.  The punch hurt like hell but Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact=
 caused the Raptor to be knocked back about ten feet but he stayed on his f=
eat. He looked back  at the attacker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hop=
e that wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to have to eliminate you in an unfai=
r fight".
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
           =
             From: THECODE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                        Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
         =
               Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three=
 should get help.


                        OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razo=
rclaw, post damage...
                          ----- Original Message ----=
- 
                          From: CYBERWOLF4 
                          To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Tuesday, December 19,=
 2000 10:31 AM
                          Subject: three on one hardly seems=
 fair, maybe the three should get help.


                          Razor C=
law saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for=
 escaping alliance members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got=
 the go ahead. He chased the three until they were out of the way of the fi=
ght. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "Y=
ou will stop or you will be forced to, your choice."

                     =
     He aproached the three bots ready for battle and hoping that things wo=
n't be ended peacefully.
                            ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
                            From: dachande 
                       =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                            Sent: Monday, Dece=
mber 18, 2000 7:40 PM
                            Subject: Eclipse, Wolveri=
tron, and Ramus


                            ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::=

                             
                                They had hea=
rd the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflic=
t. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther=
 they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.















=





          eGroups Sponsor
